attributes.action: follow the recommendations of the Advisory Council on the Misuse of Drugs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a parent I am extremely alarmed by the governments determination to apply policy on drug use based on its members' ignorance of the subject.

Employing highly skilled individuals to investigate the true dangers / benefits to society of substances and then disregarding the work undertaken is immoral, dangerous and politically motivated.

Lawmakers should work in the public interest not for their own ends...!
